name: Coffeana Jons for VR Jam 2022
description:
Hi there! I present my project to participate in VR-Jam 2022. Welcome to Coffeana Jones: Mystery of the Paper Cup, a world in which a small Egyptian civilization was enslaved by the villain - the coffee cup :)) Your task is to get through the labyrinth of mummies, steal this glass and send it for recycling at the starting point of the game. Game prototype is available for download and installation on Oculus Quest 2

Don't forget rate my project :) 

Assets: Free Mummie Monster, Wood Furn Pack

Textures from https://www.textures.com/

My last gamedev showcases: https://www.behance.net/chotamsdev 

Contact me in telegram: https://t.me/chotamsdev 

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/chotamsdev/
